description:
curve25519: update +build comment for go1.0.3

The Go 1.0.3 go command wants the // +build in a block by itself.

Fixes issue 4180.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.crypto

LGTM

On Mon, Oct 1, 2012 at 12:52 PM,  <rsc@golang.org> wrote:
> Reviewers: golang-dev_googlegroups.com,
>
> Message:
> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://code.google.com/p/go.crypto
>
>
> Description:
> curve25519: update +build comment for go1.0.3
>
> The Go 1.0.3 go command wants the // +build in a block by itself.
>
> Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/6587054/
>
> Affected files:
>   M curve25519/curve25519.go
>
>
> Index: curve25519/curve25519.go
> ===================================================================
> --- a/curve25519/curve25519.go
> +++ b/curve25519/curve25519.go
> @@ -4,6 +4,7 @@
>
>  // We have a implementation in amd64 assembly so this code is only run on
>  // non-amd64 platforms.
> +
>  // +build !amd64
>
>  package curve25519
>
>

The original report now sounds like maybe it was just using an old
copy of the file, which used to have the package line above the +build
line. Waiting to see if this is really necessary.

subject: code review 6587054: curve25519: update +build comment for go1.0.3
